entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: This last one was tough. The Darklighter Cache had been broken into and you had to get a complete inventory before the Desert Demons cleaned the place out. You managed to do it . Now Bastra wants you to get to her slicer with the data.
entries.journal_entry_description: Some of the cargo that you are tracking for Bastra has ended up in the hands of the Darklighter clan. You need to get a complete inventory of what they purchased.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: Good job on getting through the Valarian's depot. The last place to check out is a Darklighter storage facility. I am uploading the information now.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The Darklighters have stored the supplies in a cavern complex near the estate. You need to go to the cavern, enter it and start inventorying the supplies there.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Looks like a Darklight guard is hiding near the cave. You should talk to him.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The Darklighter clan has been purchasing supplies as a hedge against the coming civil war. But it looks like their security devices have failed. You need to go into cavern and get an inventory before everything is either destroyed or carried away by scavengers. It's a race against time.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: Well done. I have credited your account. I need to get this data to my slicer now.
